body.raw:
# RadioGroup A set of radio buttons where only one can be checked at a time. ## Installation ## Import - **RadioGroupRoot**: All parts of the radio group are included. - **RadioGroupItem**: A checkable group item with an input for proper event propagation in forms. - **RadioGroupIndicator**: Renders when the radio item is checked, allowing direct styling or use as an icon wrapper. - **RadioGroupIcon**: Indicates whether the status is checked or unchecked. - **RadioGroupLabel**: Display text. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { RadioGroup } from '@melio-ui/radio-group'; radio1 radio2 ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### RadioGroupRoot All parts of the radio group are included. TypeAttributes.Orientation

"horizontal" | "vertical" ), description: 'Direction for the placement of the RadioGroup component.', }, { name: 'disabled', required: false, type: 'boolean', description: 'Determines whether the radio group is inactive.', }, { name: 'onValueChange', required: false, type: ( <> {`(value: RadioValue) => void`}

RadioValue: string | number ), description: 'This is an event handler that is triggered when the state of a radio group changes.', }, ]} /> ### RadioGroupItem A checkable group item with an input for proper event propagation in forms. {`React. InputHTMLAttributes `} ), description: 'Attributes assigned to the input element.', }, ]} /> ### RadioGroupIndicator Renders when the radio item is checked, allowing direct styling or use as an icon wrapper. React.ReactNode', description: 'Elements rendered when a radio is checked.', }, ]} /> ### RadioGroupIcon Indicates whether the status is checked or unchecked. ### RadioGroupLabel Display text. ## Examples ### defaultChecked ```jsx Radio1 Radio2 Radio3 ``` ### disabled ```jsx Radio1 Radio2 Radio3 ``` ### Indicator children function ```jsx render=true function IndicatorFunc() { return ( {(checked: boolean) => { if (checked) return ; return ; }} User1 {(checked: boolean) => { if (checked) return ; return ; }} User2 {(checked: boolean) => { if (checked) return ; return ; }} User3 ); } render(); function CheckedUserIcon() { return ( ); } function UncheckedUserIcon() { return ( ); } ``` ### Checked/Unchecked Icon ```jsx render=true function CustomRadioIcon() { return ( } uncheckedIcon={} /> User1 } uncheckedIcon={} /> User2 } uncheckedIcon={} /> User3 ); } render(); function CheckedUserIcon() { return ( ); } function UncheckedUserIcon() { return ( ); } ``` ### Orientation ```jsx Radio1 Radio2 Radio3 ```
